definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc)/(literary) shoes and belt
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
half-track (vehicle with wheels at the front and continuous tracks in the rear)

sentences.english: Panzer Elite Infantry Halftrack health reduced from 300 to 285.
sentences.chinese: 装甲精英步兵半履带车生命由300降低至285。

sentences.english: A track-based version of the system is currently in development.
sentences.chinese: 一种基于履带类型的系统正在发展中。

sentences.english: With crawler, it is easy and fast to find out the drill hole position.
sentences.chinese: 采用履带行走机构，移动孔位方便，快捷。

sentences.english: Flanking its long body are two outrigger treads that allow the tank to turn.
sentences.chinese: 两条外架式履带在狭长的车身两侧，帮助坦克转向。

sentences.english: The invention named 'Zheng tyre pedrail' is mainly used in the mining industry.
sentences.chinese: “郑氏轮胎履带”的发明，主要应用于采矿工程领域。

sentences.english: Rubber tracks, by contrast, usually last more than 3,000km.
sentences.chinese: 比较之下，橡胶履带通常能够使用超过3000公里。

sentences.english: The British company also fields a line of four track-mounted articulated booms.
sentences.chinese: 而英国公司也对履带铰链式起重臂进行了实地试验。

sentences.english: Spaced armor is found on all tanks in the form of tracks or the mantlet.
sentences.chinese: 所有坦克的履带和炮盾都是以间隙装甲的形式建模的。

sentences.english: We're going to cut out their living guts and use them to grease the treads of our tanks.
sentences.chinese: 我们还要掏出他们的五脏六腑来润滑我们的坦克履带。

sentences.english: Crawler crane and hydraulic cranes are also used for steel structure buildings.
sentences.chinese: 履带吊和汽车吊在钢结构建筑建设中很常见。

sentences.english: Steering- loads are focused on when tracks slip and track- width are taken into account.
sentences.chinese: 讨论计履带滑动及履带宽时转向负荷计算问题。

sentences.english: Steering- loads are focused on when tracks slip and track- width are taken into account.
sentences.chinese: 讨论计履带滑动及履带宽时转向负荷计算问题。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the composition and principle of track gas- fired automatic welding machine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了履带式燃气自动焊接专机的组成和工作原理。

sentences.english: Rubber tracks on two wheels driving ATV. Useing with the displacement of 110cc-250cc.
sentences.chinese: 本橡胶履带适用于两驱ATV配套使用。

sentences.english: Track salt carriers modified from excavators have also been preserved in the depot.
sentences.chinese: 台盐自行改装自怪手的履带式运盐车。

definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc)
half-track (vehicle with wheels at the front and continuous tracks in the rear)
